GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v6.0.13
GSD.description:
mm/khugepaged: take the right locks for page table retraction

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.13 by commit 97d3a58bc95bb3b4c2240bf5319d5ccbfc56d393, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit 27e1f8273113adec0e98bf513e4091636b27cc2a. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: mm/khugepaged: take the right locks for page table retraction
